sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Many performance issues like freezing, lag, or failed startups are caused by aging hard drives, overheating, or misconfigured software, not hardware failure.
Upgrading a traditional hard drive to an SSD can improve speed by 5 to 10 times and often costs far less than buying a new computer.
Even when a computer will not boot, data recovery is often possible without wiping the drive or reinstalling the system if handled correctly.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We provide reliable diagnostics and repair for laptops and desktops, covering both hardware and software issues.
Whether your system is running slow, overheating, crashing, or failing to start, we work to identify the root cause and restore performance without unnecessary replacements.
items: Run full diagnostics to pinpoint performance and boot issues
Repair or replace failed drives, memory, or cooling components
Improve startup time and responsiveness through system optimization
Recover data from non-booting or partially damaged systems
Extend device lifespan by addressing the real problem instead of pushing a replacement

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We begin with a non-destructive diagnostic to find out what is really going on with your system.
If repair makes sense, we explain your options clearly with upfront pricing and no pressure.
We only fix what is needed and preserve your data whenever possible so you get the most out of your device.
